step.context: \textbf{Check Point\#1: }\text{Is the following function}\\ \text{defined and continuous in }\left[2 , 3\right]?
step.tex: \text{No. }\dfrac{1}{x}\text{ is not continuous at }x =0\text{ and therefore}\\ \text{not defined and continuous in }\left[2,3\right]
step.reason: \int_{a}^{b} f \left(x\right)\,dx \text{ makes sense only if }f \left(x\right) \text{ is defined}\\ \text{and continuous in }\left[2,3\right],\text{ for example }\int \dfrac{1}{x}\,dx \\ \text{is not defined because }\dfrac{1}{x}\text{ is discontinuous at }\\ x = 0 \in \left[-1, 1\right].
